questions.question: Do you think consciousness, understanding consciousness, is within the reach of science or the scientific method?
What do you think is the most promising, most interesting as a civilization that we should invest in?
Where do you see the biggest benefit arriving from on the machine side or the human side?
Do you see the value of using machine learning to understand the language of the two-way communication with the brain?
Do you have a sense, high level, that Tesla's on track on being able to achieve full autonomy?
